title: Missouri National Recreational River: In Class Education Programs
body: In Class Education Programs        Missouri National Recreational River ranger gives an educational program to a group of schoolchildren NPS photo   Â    Missouri National Recreational River Rangers In Your Classroom Bring the national park to your students! Rangers from Missouri National Recreational River present curriculum-coordinated programs for K-12 students on a variety of topics. Contact the park at 605-665-0209 or e-mail.
